plot outline: Jayakumar -'JK' in short, is that typical young man of this generation who cares more for worldly pleasures such as girls and parties, has scant respect for his family and spends most of his time wooing girls on the internet. But all this changes drastically when one such party ends in tragedy. The physical and emotional trauma forces him to rethink his lifestyle and he begins his quest for an honest yet quickly rewarding career to meet his family needs. The inspiring show he puts on despite numerous challenges is what the rest of 'JK' is all about
title: JK Enum Nanbanin Vaazhkai
plot: Jayakumar -'JK' in short, is that typical young man of this generation who cares more for worldly pleasures such as girls and parties, has scant respect for his family and spends most of his time wooing girls on the internet. But all this changes drastically when one such party ends in tragedy. The physical and emotional trauma forces him to rethink his lifestyle and he begins his quest for an honest yet quickly rewarding career to meet his family needs. The inspiring show he puts on despite numerous challenges is what the rest of 'JK' is all about::PipingHotViews

_JK Enum Nanbanin Vaazhkai_ (qv) (Life of a friend named JK) is a 2015, Indian Tamil drama film, directed by award winning director Cheran, is about a protagonist millennial JK played by Sharwanand), a man with a fateful secret who embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption forever changing the lives of his friends and family. The story is narrated by one of his close fiends played by Nitya Menon.::Truefix Studios
